collaborative_description: Multiple tutors working together to provide comprehensive answers
random_description: A random tutor will be selected to answer your questions
select_description: Choose which tutor you want to chat with
get_clear_explanations: Get clear explanations of lecture concepts
explain_placeholder: Ask me to explain any concept from the lecture...
discuss_placeholder: Share your thoughts or ask a discussion question...
explain_welcome: Hi! I'm here to help you understand the lecture content. Ask me about any concept, term, or topic from this lecture, and I'll explain it clearly with examples.
discuss_welcome: Let's discuss the lecture material together! I'll ask thought-provoking questions to help you think critically about the content. What aspect would you like to explore?
no_pdfs_found: No PDFs found in this lecture
failed_get_response: Failed to get response. Please try again.
select_tutor_description: Choose a tutor from the sidebar to start a conversation. Each tutor has a unique teaching style.
best_tutor_auto_selected: Best tutor auto-selected for each message
auto_title: Auto-Route: AI picks the best tutor
press_enter_to_send: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
hello_greeting: Hello! I'm {{name}}. How can I help you today?
welcome_team_chat: Welcome to Team Chat! All tutors can participate here.
question_placeholder: What would you like to understand about this lecture?
failed_create_question: Failed to create question. Please try again.
ask_question_description: Ask a question about the lecture content and get a detailed explanation
style_sequential_desc: One after another, building on each other
auto_select_desc: System picks 2 relevant tutors based on your question
tip_parallel: Selected tutors respond at the same time.
tip_sequential: Tutors respond in order, each building on previous answers.
tip_debate: Tutors argue different perspectives over 2 rounds.
tip_random: Picks 1-3 random tutors who have a real discussion (each sees previous responses).
